title: Sadako-san to Sadako-chan
original_name: 貞子さんとさだこちゃん
sinopse:
A spin-off comic based on the movie Sadako has appeared! Sadako, who doesn't get to appear much in the film, was actually doing this and that?! Witness a short comedy from Sadako's perspective! You may see a side of Sadako you've never seen before...?

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)
